online.search.nn
Interface CoordinateMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
HexCoordinateMap, SquareCoordinateMap
public interface CoordinateMap

a CoordinateMap is used by filter layers to map indexes of neurons to those of adjacent neurons.

Author:
Ddyer
